item.title: Summary - Hurricane Irma (AT1/AL112017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...HURRICANE WARNINGS ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...HURRICANE WATCHES ISSUED FOR THE BRITISH AND U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS AND PUERTO RICO... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Sep 4 the center of Irma was located near 16.8, -53.3 with movement WSW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 944 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.
